Powerful cold email outreach and lead en: 强大的冷却电子邮件外联和牵头参与平台。
\nYou can obtain an API key from **Setti: 您可以从 **Settings->Integrations->API 密钥**获取一个 API 密钥。
Create a new cold email campaign in Inst: 立即创建新的冷却电子邮件活动
创建一个新的牵头列表。
添加一个导致营销活动的线索。
Searchs for campaigns using various filt: 使用各种过滤器搜索活动。
Search for leads in Instantly by name or: 立即通过姓名或电子邮件搜索线索。
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Whether to send emails Monday-Friday: 是否发送电子邮件周一至周五
Whether to send emails Saturday-Sunday: 星期六星期六星期天是否发送邮件
Gap between emails in minutes: 几分钟内电子邮件之间的差距
Maximum random wait time in minutes: 最大随机等待时间（分钟）
Daily limit for sending emails: 发送电子邮件的每日限制
Whether to stop campaign on reply: 是否在回复时停止活动
Whether to track links in emails: 是否跟踪电子邮件中的链接
Whether to track opens in emails: 是否在电子邮件中跟踪打开
Whether to stop campaign on auto-reply: 自动回复时是否停止活动
Maximum daily new leads to contact: 联系人每日最大新线索
Stop campaign for the company (domain) w: 在领先回复时停止公司的活动 (域名)
Insert unsubscribe header in emails: 在电子邮件中插入退订信头
Whether this list runs the enrichment pr: 此列表是否在每个添加的铅上运行浓缩过程。
如果在营销活动中存在则跳过领头。
Search string to find leads - can be Fir: 搜索字符串以查找线索 - 可以是名字、姓氏或电子邮件(例如"John Doe")。
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
HEAD: 黑色
Triggers when a campaign status changes: 当活动状态发生变化时触发(已完成、暂停等)。
Triggers when a new lead is added to a c: 当新的领头被添加到活动中时触发
\n To use this trigger, manually se:
To use this trigger, manually set up a webhook in Instantly.ai:

      1. Go to Instantly settings.
      2. Navigate to Integrations tab and find webhooks.
      3. Click "Add Webhook".
      4. Enter the webhook URL provided below:
          ```text
          {{webhookUrl}}
          ```
      5. Select the campaign and event type "Campaign Completed".
      6. Click "Add Webhook".
